name: Every
headline: Banking + Payroll/Benefits + Bookkeeping + Tax in one place
description:
Setup your entire back-office in one place.
- Banking: Bank Accounts, Corporate Cards, Payments, Treasury
- Bookkeeping & Tax: Keep you books in order and file income taxes at the end of the year
- Payroll and Benefits: US Payroll in 50 states, US Contractors, International Contractors. Health, Vision, Dental, 401k Benefits

founders.name: Rajeev Behera, Founder
founders.description: Rajeev was the co-founder and CEO of Reflektive, where he raised $100 million in venture capital and built the organization to 250 employees. Reflektive was ranked the 13th fastest growing company in North America by Deloitte in terms of revenue growth.

**Company Overview: Every**

**Founded:** 2021  
**Team Size:** 12 employees  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Investment:** Participated in Y Combinator Batch S23, backed by Garry Tan  

### What is Every?

Every is on a mission to simplify the complex world of business management. Imagine having a single platform that brings together banking, payroll, benefits, bookkeeping, and taxes all in one place. It's a comprehensive back-office solution designed for founders and small business owners.

### Services Offered

1. **Banking:**  
   - Set up bank accounts, corporate cards, and treasury operations.
   - Seamless money transfers and corporate payments.

2. **Bookkeeping & Taxes:**  
   - Real-time bookkeeping and end-of-year tax filing, ensuring your finances are always in order.

3. **Payroll and Benefits:**  
   - Manage payroll across all 50 states for U.S. employees as well as international contractors.
   - Offer health, dental, vision, and retirement plans (401k).

4. **AI Autopilots:**  
   - Automate tedious administrative tasks like expenses and payroll processing, allowing you to focus on growth.

### Unique Selling Points

- **All-In-One Platform:** No need to juggle multiple services; Every integrates everything from incorporation to banking.
- **Speedy Setup:** Customers have reported getting set up within hours, which significantly reduces the overhead typically associated with payroll and bookkeeping.
- **Cashback Rewards:** Founders can earn 1-2% cashback on spending through Every debit cards, reinvesting those funds directly into their personal bank accounts.
- **Concierge Support:** A dedicated HR and finance team to help ease the challenges that come with running a startup.

### Customer Testimonials

Founders from various startups have lauded Every for its efficiency and ease of use. Users like Adi Agashe (Fiber), Luke Groesbeck (Foundation), and George Wang (Stellar Sleep) echo the sentiment that Every significantly reduces the administrative workload, allowing them to concentrate on product and customer-centric activities.

### Current Promotions

Every is currently offering a limited-time free C-Corp incorporation service, enticing startups to streamline their setup processes right from the start.

### Explore More

To dive deeper into what Every can do, visit their website: [Every.io](https://every.io/). There, you can explore their full range of services and find out how they can simplify your business management today.

Whether you're a solo entrepreneur or managing a growing team, Every aims to bring simplicity and efficiency to your back-office operations.
